Name: NeXus: One Core
About the game: NeXus: One Core is fast. It is challenging. It will test your skills like only a few games did before. Ready yourself for a extreme survival run paced by an immersive DnB Music. Set on a straight-line futurist track, your goal is to avoid obstacles while changing your ship color to pass deadly portals. Play alone or share the control of your ship with a second player in a rad co-op mode. Either way, expect not to drop your controler anytime soon. Features One of the most extreme runner out there Exclusive Fusion / Unfusion mechanics (co-op mode) Randomly generated tracks Ranking system with Leaderboards A wide range of game modes Customizable ships
